content:
[build-system]
requires = ["setuptools>=42", "wheel"]
build-backend = "setuptools.build_meta"

[project]
name = "hypercode"
version = "1.0.0"
description = "Neurodivergent-first programming language with universal AI compatibility"
authors = [
    {name = "Lyndz Williams (welshDog)", email = "lyndzwills@gmail.com"}
]
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.9"
license = {text = "MIT"}
keywords = ["programming-language", "neurodivergent", "accessibility", "ai", "spatial-reasoning"]
classifiers = [
    "Development Status :: 4 - Beta",
    "Intended Audience :: Developers",
    "Intended Audience :: Education",
    "License :: OSI Approved :: MIT License",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3 :: Only",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.9",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.10",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.11",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.12",
    "Topic :: Software Development :: Compilers",
    "Topic :: Scientific/Engineering :: Artificial Intelligence",
    "Topic :: Education",
]

dependencies = [
    "aiohttp>=3.9.0",
    "pydantic>=2.5.0",
    "python-dotenv>=1.0.0",
    "requests>=2.31.0",
    "typing-extensions>=4.9.0",
    # AI providers
    "anthropic>=0.7.0",  # Claude
    "openai>=1.6.0",     # OpenAI/GPT
    "mistralai>=0.0.11", # Mistral
    "ollama>=0.6.0",     # Local Ollama
    # Knowledge graph
    "networkx>=3.2",
    "rdflib>=7.0.0",
    # Data processing
    "numpy>=2.0.0",
    "pandas>=2.0.0",
    # Web framework
    "fastapi>=0.104.0",
    "uvicorn>=0.24.0",
]

[project.optional-dependencies]
dev = [
    "pytest>=7.4.3",
    "pytest-cov>=4.1.0",
    "pytest-asyncio>=0.21.1",
    "pytest-mock>=3.15.0",
    "black>=23.12.1",
    "ruff>=0.1.9",
    "mypy>=1.8.0",
    "pre-commit>=3.6.0",
    "bandit>=1.7.6",
    "safety>=3.0.0",
    "pip-audit>=2.9.0",
    "coverage>=7.11.0",
    "mkdocs-material>=9.1.0",
    "mkdocs-git-revision-date-plugin>=1.2.0",
    "sphinx>=7.2.0",
    "sphinx-rtd-theme>=2.0.0",
]

accessibility = [
    "beautifulsoup4>=4.12.0",
    "wcag-validators>=0.1.0",
]

research = [
    "arxiv>=2.3.0",
    "scholarly>=1.7.0",
    "langchain>=0.3.0",
    "langchain-openai>=0.3.0",
    "langchain-anthropic>=0.3.0",
]

[project.scripts]
hypercode = "src.hypercode.__main__:main"

[tool.setuptools.packages.find]
where = ["src", "ai_gateway", "accessibility"]

[tool.black]
line-length = 100
target-version = ['py39', 'py310', 'py311', 'py312']

[tool.ruff]
line-length = 100
target-version = "py39"

[tool.mypy]
python_version = "3.9"
warn_return_any = true
warn_unused_configs = true
disallow_untyped_defs = false

[tool.pytest.ini_options]
testpaths = ["tests"]
python_files = "test_*.py"
python_functions = "test_*"
addopts = "-v --cov=src --cov=ai_gateway --cov=accessibility"

[tool.bandit]
exclude_dirs = ["/tests", "/docs", "/examples"]
